creator: Erich.Meier@methodpark.de
text:
I use the pageContext.include() method to implement a customized include-tag.
This has worked up to 4.0-rc1.

With 4.0-rc1 this causes an exception:
javax.servlet.ServletException: java.io.IOException: Illegal to flush within a 
custom tag

The servletapi-doc says, that pageContext.include() does an implicit autoflush. 
Do I have to switch that off somehow?

Up until 4.0-rc1, Tomcat 4 was incorrectly *not* doing the flush in it.  In rc1,
this was added to conform to the spec.  Because it is a spec requirement, there
is no way to turn it off.
